name: One room - lots of stuff
description:
Furnish a room. Keep similar furniture close for bonus points. Some pieces dislike others. You will lose points for unused/lost furniture. Be quick for great Max score.

---

Made using:

  • - Unity
  • - Visual Studio
  • - Paint.net

With help from:

  • http://www.1001freefonts.com/ (Font)
  • http://sfbgames.com/chiptone/ (Sounds)
  • http://tones.wolfram.com/ (Music)

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=7048
